Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie originally titled 'Buddah'?
Options:
A. a) Charmy Kaur was hired for her Bollywood debut role in the movie.
B. b) The director Jagannadh aimed to hire three leading heroines for the film.
C. c) The movie 'Buddah' was released in 2011.
D. d) Jagannadh directed the movie 'Buddah'.
Answer: a) Charmy Kaur was hired for her Bollywood debut role in the movie., b) The director Jagannadh aimed to hire three leading heroines for the film.
